attributes.action: Stop blaitant exploitation of immigration by many companies
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Immigration is supposed to be used to fill Job gaps but with the influx of immigrants not Just from easten Europe but other sources of cheap labour I have witnessed with my own eyes companies using this influx of labour to lower wages and recruit a cheaper work force. 

Up until a year ago I worked for a company and for years we tried desperately to receive a better pay to coincide with the continue raising living cost of London. But all hopes were dashed when the company had access to this work force and lowered wages even more! 

It’s a huge abuse by companies wanting to make even bigger profits at the British work forces expense.

Something needs to be done to stop this abuse ASAP.
